detail_desc: Knee-length skirt in sturdy twill made from a wool blend. Regular waist, zip fly and buttons, large patch front pockets, welt back pockets, and a slit at the front of the hem. Lined.

Long, lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a faux fur-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip with a wind flap and concealed press-studs down the front. Drawstring at the waist, side pockets with a button, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Quilted lining.
Short, fitted, sleeveless jersey dress with crossover shoulder straps. Lined at the top.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Trainers in patterned cotton canvas with sequins, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with an opening and ties at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length jumpsuit with a lace top and bottoms in woven fabric. Deep V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the front and an opening down the back with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves and narrow cuffs with a covered button. Lined with a detachable inner top in woven fabric with a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Seam at the waist with pleats and a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back. Diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe with a U-shaped decoration at the top, detachable strap at the back of the neck and a concealed silicone trim at the top.
Block-print T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Straight-cut yoga top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Cut out section on one shoulder and at the back.
Henley top in jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with a tab and button.

Backpack in grained imitation leather with an imitation suede front. Handle and zip at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps,a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 11x22x31 cm.

Dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a pair of leggings in jersey. Dress with long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back of one shoulder, and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Leggings with an elasticated waist and all-over print.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with a cut-out section at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, V-neck top with smocking and ties at the back and narrow adjustable shoulder straps Lined at the front.
High-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and flared legs.
Blouse in a cupro and viscose weave with a deep V-neck at the back with crossover straps, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a straight-cut hem.

Calf-length, V-neck dress in a viscose weave with concealed buttons down the front, a stand-up collar with decorative gathers at the front and short, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Seam at the waist with gathered sections front and back, narrow elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Flared skirt. Unlined.

Pyjamas with a long-sleeved top and bottoms in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Short, sleeveless top in sturdy jersey with a V-neck front and back, wide, covered elastic at the hem, flatlock seams and a foil print. Unlined.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist, pleats at the front, a zip fly and buttons, side pockets, fake back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short-sleeved lace top with an opening at the back and button at the back of the neck. Partly lined.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. High waist with a wide waist panel.
5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening.
Platform ankle boots with a zip in one side and covered heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber soles. Platform front 1.4 cm, heel 12 cm.
Strapless maxi dress in jersey with an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides. Integral top with elastication at the top.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and rounded hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Elasticated hairbands with appliqués.

Long-sleeved top and a pair of joggers in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Joggers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Metal earrings in various designs. One pair of small studs, one pair in the shape of avocado halves and one pair in the shape of fried eggs. Size from 0.2 to 1.3 cm.
Leather belt with a metal buckle. Width 3.5 cm.
Long-sleeved jumper in a fine, printed knit with slits in the sides.
Knee-length, printed swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Thickly padded bag in a jacquard weave made from recycled polyester containing silk and glittery threads. Decorative Piñatex® imitation leather band with a metallic coating and sparkly stone studs. Concealed zip with a magnetic fastener at the top and a detachable metal shoulder strap. Decorative contrasting colour trims, a zipped inner pocket and lining in contrasting colour satin. Size approx. 12x33x45 cm. Piñatex® is an innovative material made from pineapple leaf fibres. The leaves are a byproduct of existing agriculture, turned into a non-woven material that can be used as an alternative to leather.
Long-sleeved top in glittery, lightweight jersey with crossover straps at the top of the back. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lined triangle bikini top in scuba fabric with ties at the back of the neck and a narrow metal fastener at the back.

Long, sleeveless dress in airy chiffon with pleats at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a short gathered frill and decorative narrow ties at the sides, and a gathered, draped skirt. Lined.

Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with a tab and metal D-rings at the waist, zip fly and fake welt back pockets. Tapered legs with a decorative seam down the front and slit at the front of the hems.

Ankle-length trousers in soft cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist with grosgrain ties that can be tied into a bow at the front, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets.

Short-sleeved shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and rounded hem. Bow tie in a patterned weave with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener.
Short blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, wrapover front, long sleeves and an elasticated hem.
Dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut skirt. Unlined.
Wide T-shirt in soft, marled jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend in a relaxed fit with cut-off, raw-edge sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Shirt in washed denim with a detachable hood in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs down the front, a yoke at the back, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. The cotton content of the shirt is partly recycled.
V-neck top in airy, crinkled chiffon with lace sections and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.
Bolero in fine-knit cotton with a faceted, heart-shaped button and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Hairbands in an airy weave. Can be worn around the head or a ponytail.
Sweatpants in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length culottes in a recycled polyester weave. Regular waist with elastication at the back and pleats at the front, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Fitted top in soft jersey with a wide lace trim at the top, 3/4-length raglan sleeves and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Baby Exclusive. Socks in a soft, rib-knit wool blend. Supplied in a box.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Wide, double-layered blouse in a plumeti weave with a stand-up collar and covered buttons down the back. Long flounced sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Elastication around the top, buttons down the front and narrow elastication around the sleeves and hem.

5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim. Slightly looser fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and tapered legs. Some of the cotton content of the jeans is recycled.
Long-sleeved blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with a V-neck and decorative gathers at the shoulders. Two elasticated seams at the waist, and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in airy, tiered chiffon with a raw-edge neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Ankle-length jumpsuit in fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and gathers in the side seams for best fit over the tummy.

Dress in soft tulle with a shimmering pattern. Round neckline with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication around the hems, and a flared skirt. Lined.
NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Plastic Alice band covered in patterned satin with a large bow on one side with a small rabbit-shaped pendant.
Metal rings in various designs. Three decorated with sparkly glass beads.
Wide V-neck jumper knitted in a wool blend with low dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hooded jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with narrow shoulder straps and elastication with a flounce at the top. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Short, sleeveless top in jersey that is slightly shorter at the front with a draped detail at the hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, classic front, chest pocket and rounded hem. Easy-iron finish.

Shirt jacket in a Tencel™ lyocell and cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke at the back. Open chest pockets, a sleeve placket and adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.
